name: Goscomb Technologies
tag_list: transit, iptransit, ip-transit, data-transit, bgp, leased-line, adsl, sdsl
overview:
Goscomb Technologies Limited are London (UK) based providers of business grade Network and Hosting Services operating an International network. Based on this solid foundation Goscomb Technologies can offer a range of services from simple website hosting through to colocation and BGP IP / data transit at a variety of speeds in the UK, Netherlands and France.

IP Transit allows your network to become part of the global Internet by connecting to the Internet backbone at high speed within one of the Goscomb Technologies on-net locations.

In addition to Transit services Goscomb Technologies also offer leased lines, broadband and various hosting services.
